languages.text: "Почему твои воспоминания об этом такие синие? И чем дальше — тем темнее и темнее..."
"Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."
languages.original_text: "Почему твои воспоминания об этом такие синие? И чем дальше — тем темнее и темнее..."

traits.locale_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “为什么你对这件事情的回忆全都是蓝色的？而且你说得越多，蓝色就变得越是阴暗……”
languages.original_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."

traits.locale_text: “为什么你对这件事情的回忆全都是蓝色的？而且你说得越多，蓝色就变得越是阴暗……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué son tan azules sus recuerdos al respecto? Y cuanto más habla de ello, más oscuro es su tono...».
languages.original_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué son tan azules sus recuerdos al respecto? Y cuanto más habla de ello, más oscuro es su tono...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「どうしてあなたの記憶はそんなにも青いの？そしてあなたがそれを話すほどに、より青は濃くなっていく…」
languages.original_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしてあなたの記憶はそんなにも青いの？そしてあなたがそれを話すほどに、より青は濃くなっていく…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Warum sind Eure Erinnerungen daran so melancholisch? Und je mehr Ihr davon sprecht, desto melancholischer werden sie ..."
languages.original_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."

traits.locale_text: "Warum sind Eure Erinnerungen daran so melancholisch? Und je mehr Ihr davon sprecht, desto melancholischer werden sie ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi vos souvenirs de cette époque sont-ils autant enveloppés de bleu ? Et plus vous en parlez, plus le bleu devient foncé... »
languages.original_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi vos souvenirs de cette époque sont-ils autant enveloppés de bleu ? Et plus vous en parlez, plus le bleu devient foncé... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Neden buralara dair hatıraların bu kadar mavi? Ne kadar çok sözünü edersen tonu da o kadar koyulaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."

traits.locale_text: "Neden buralara dair hatıraların bu kadar mavi? Ne kadar çok sözünü edersen, mavi o kadar çok koyulaşıyor..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Why are your recollections of this so blue? And the more you talk about it, the darker the blue becomes..."
